lines: !throw You are not a registered player!
!throw You may only use this command within your own player channel.
!throw You have already offered a card to the Medics.
!throw You must discard/fuse {!tag {me} must_discard} cards first!
!throw That card won't be worth anything.
!throw You do not have any {!e to_str {card}} to offer.
!say Success! Your {!e to_str {card}} payment will allow you to heal **{ammo}** HP at the end of the round.
